title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc, the perfect flying disc designed with the needs of elderly folks in mind. 

With its 36 high-quality LEDs, this disc is 100x brighter than any other light-up flying disc on the market. It offers a staggering 16 million color options, allowing you to customize your disc to your heart's content. 

The TOSY Flying Disc features smart modes, including adjustable brightness levels and a timer mode, making it simple to use for anyone. It also comes equipped with motion sensors that automatically light up the disc when it detects movement, ensuring you never lose sight of it. 

No need to worry about constantly buying batteries - the TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable. It only takes 30 minutes to fully charge, providing you with up to a thousand throws or a full 90-minute match. Plus, it comes with a USB Type C to C cable for convenient charging. 

Weighing only 175 grams, this disc is lightweight and easy to handle, making it perfect for elderly folks. It meets professional standards, guaranteeing its quality and performance. 

The TOSY Flying Disc is versatile and can be used for various activities. Whether you want to play at night, perform freestyle tricks, or engage in disc games like Beersbee or Polish Horseshoes, this disc has got you covered. 

Not only is it durable and waterproof, but it also meets the highest standards of durability, ensuring it can withstand any game or weather condition. 

Experience the joy of flying discs with ease and confidence. Get your very own TOSY Flying Disc today!

Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - the perfect flying disc designed specifically for our beloved seniors! This state-of-the-art disc is packed with amazing features and characteristics that make it easily accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

First and foremost, the TOSY Flying Disc features a whopping 36 LEDs, making it 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc available on the market. With its 16 million color RGB options, you can customize the disc to your heart's content, creating a mesmerizing light show that will surely catch everyone's attention.

But that's not all! The TOSY Flying Disc is equipped with smart modes and motion sensors, ensuring that the brightness level and timer mode are always just right. Plus, it automatically lights up when in motion, making it easy to spot even in low-light conditions.

Forget about constantly buying batteries - the TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable! With just a 30-minute charge duration, you'll be ready to throw it for up to a thousand times or enjoy a full 90-minute match. And don't worry, we've included a convenient USB Type C to C cable for easy charging, although the charger itself is not included.

Weighing in at a comfortable 175 grams, the TOSY Flying Disc meets professional standards, ensuring a perfect flight every time. It's suitable for a variety of use cases, from night play to freestyle tricks. And if you're a fan of disc games like Beersbee or Polish Horseshoes, this is the disc for you!

Not only is the TOSY Flying Disc durable, but it's also waterproof, so you can play worry-free even on rainy days. Its high durability means it will withstand any impact, ensuring it will be a long-lasting companion for all your outdoor adventures.

Don't miss out on this game-changing disc that will bring joy and excitement to your outdoor activities. Get your TOSY Flying Disc today and experience the thrill of flying like never before!
